record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2416
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2416 -- (Senate - December 06, 2007)

[Page: S14817]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 2416 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2416) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the alternative minimum tax on individuals and replace it with an alternative tax individuals may choose.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to the bill.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The legislation will be placed on the calendar.
The Senator from New Jersey is recognized.
